original_text: And he commanded the chariot to stand still: and they went down both into the water, both Philip and the eunuch; and he baptized him.
korean_text: 이에 명하여 수레를 멈추고 빌립과 내시가 둘 다 물에 내려가 빌립이 세례를 베풀고

sentences.original_text: And he commanded the chariot to stand still
and they went down both into the water
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 둘 다 물로 내려갔다
